column5: Does anyone like or know anyone who likes the band Bedouin Soundclash?  I won free tickets on the radio the other day but am not really a fan of this band.  If you or maybe your 20 something children would like the tickets, you can have them.  I'll even meet or courier them to you.  The concert is next Friday, February 29, at 8 p.m. at The Sound Academy, 11 Polson Street.  I was going to take them to the Tyler Event today as a giveaway, but forgot  Thanks  Joey
Great band. I have two of their cd's and love them. I'm working next Friday though, I wish I could go,especially for free. Dang.
I'm 20 and I'm in Toronto....what kind of music is it? maybe I can check it out either way
It's kind of a modern reggae/alternative mix. Hey,hey,hey,hey...... hey beautiful day.  Here's the link http://www.sound-academy.com/events/show/52. Go,you'll love it.
Big fan!!!!  Would love to see them live. Pm me if the offer still stands.  Steve.
Thanks everyone, I got a PM right away and the tickets are gone now.  Cheers,  Joey
